text:
A terrible battle was fought between the armies of Veerbhadra and the deities.
 The deities got defeated and fled away.
 They went to lord Vishnu and sought his help.
 Lord Vishnu decided to fight on the side of the deities.
 The battle recommenced for the second time.
 Lord Vishnu having a dual fight with Veerbhadra and the deities were fighting against his army.
 Suddenly everybody heard a heavenly voice which said that Veerbhadra was invincible.
 Hearing this, Lord Vishnu and Brahmaji went to their respective abodes.
 Daksha ran for his life and hid himself behind the attar where the yagya was being performed.
 But Veerbhadra pulled him out from there and severed his head.
 He then threw his head in the agni-kunda.
 After this he returned back to Kailash accompanies by his army.
title: Daksha Gets his Head Severed
